data.title: Uptick in China’s bitcoin mining prompts debate on tapping energy surplus
data.description: China’s oversupply rate of solar energy in some regions has exceeded 10 per cent while that of wind energy has reached up to 15 per cent.
data.keywords: Cryptocurrency, HKU, China, Guojun He, Yang Liu, David Zhang, US, Bitcoin, Luxor Technology, CBECI, Hashrate Index, Bitcoin mining, Beijing, Wang Yang, Pan Gongsheng
